LED Wax Candles Set.product_title: Multi-Colour Real Wax LED Candle Set with Remote
LED Wax Candles Set.product_description: A premium set of real-wax LED candles featuring 12 adjustable colours controlled with an 18-button remote. Perfect for home décor, ambience lighting, and festive setups. Safe, flameless design with ON/OFF remote function makes it ideal for bedrooms, events, restaurants, and gifting.

3-in-1 Smart Light Pen.product_title: 3-in-1 Stylus Pen with LED Tip Light
3-in-1 Smart Light Pen.product_description: A multifunction 3-in-1 pen combining a smooth writing ballpoint, touchscreen stylus, and bright LED tip light that allows writing even in complete darkness. Durable metal body with long battery life, ideal for professionals, students, and night-time use.

Mosquito & Flying Insect Killer.product_title: Super Mosquito & Flying Insect Killer – PROTEKT Brand
Mosquito & Flying Insect Killer.product_description: A high-efficiency electric mosquito and flying insect killer designed for homes, offices, and commercial spaces. Uses UV light to attract insects and an electric grid for instant elimination. Durable metal body with powerful performance for long-term pest control.

SmartSlide Paper Shredder.product_description: A compact desktop paper shredder powered via USB or optional batteries. Ideal for destroying confidential papers, prescriptions, and small documents. Lightweight and portable with transparent shred bin for easy disposal.

Pinless Stapler.product_description: A smart pinless stapler that binds papers without the use of metal pins. Safe for kids, eco-friendly, and ideal for schools, offices, and craft activities. Creates secure paper locks by cutting and folding paper.

Portable Garment Steamer.product_description: A lightweight and portable garment steamer ideal for travel and home use. Quickly removes wrinkles from shirts, suits, and delicate fabrics. Features fast heating, ergonomic design, and easy water refill system.

Portable Reclining Seat.product_title: Portable Reclining Travel Seat with Adjustable Positions
Portable Reclining Seat.product_description: A foldable, lightweight reclining seat with high-density foam cushioning. Perfect for beach trips, picnics, gaming, and outdoor events. Features adjustable backrest positions, durable polyester cover, and easy carrying strap.

Smart Light Tip Pens.product_title: LED Smart Tip Pen for Writing in Darkness
Smart Light Tip Pens.product_description: A premium LED light pen designed for low-light and no-light environments. Ensures clear writing with a focused LED tip. Ideal for travelers, students, medical professionals, and night-shift workers.

Super Blower Fan.product_title: SmartSlide Super Blower – 2-Speed Personal Desktop Fan
Super Blower Fan.product_description: A compact 2-speed personal blower fan with quiet operation and adjustable air direction. Perfect for desktops, study areas, kids’ rooms, and travel. Consumes low power and delivers strong airflow.

Snap’n Grip Universal Wrench.product_title: Snap’n Grip Heavy Duty Universal Adjustable Wrench Set
Snap’n Grip Universal Wrench.product_description: A versatile all-purpose wrench set designed to fit nuts and bolts from 9mm to 32mm. Automatically adjusts size and shape, ideal for plumbing, mechanical, automotive, and household use. Features ergonomic grip and durable steel construction.

LED Wax Candles Set.product_title: LED Real Wax Candle Set with Remote Control
LED Wax Candles Set.product_description: A decorative LED candle set made from real wax featuring soft ambient light suitable for home décor, gifting, and festive lighting.
LED Wax Candles Set.product_info: The LED Wax Candle Set includes three premium real-wax candles designed to mimic the warm glow of traditional flames without any heat or fire risk. The product packaging highlights that the candles support multiple colour modes operated through a remote control, allowing the user to adjust colours and lighting styles based on mood or occasion. The candles appear to have a smooth, natural wax texture and are intended for indoor ambience, relaxation, and home decoration.

Smart Light Pen.product_title: 3-in-1 Smart LED Light Pen with Stylus
Smart Light Pen.product_description: A multifunction writing pen featuring an LED light tip and touch stylus for versatile daily use.
Smart Light Pen.product_info: The Smart Light Pen features a built-in LED light at the writing tip, enabling clear writing in dark or low-light environments. The body of the pen shows a sleek metallic finish and includes a soft stylus tip for touchscreen devices. The packaging emphasizes the product’s practicality for students, professionals, and individuals who need a reliable writing tool for night-time use. Its compact design and illuminated nib make it ideal for travel, bedside jotting, and emergency note-taking.

Mosquito Killer.product_description: A high-performance electric mosquito killer designed to trap and eliminate flying insects indoors.
Mosquito Killer.product_info: The Mosquito Killer unit has a metal grid façade and an internal UV light attraction system visible through the protective housing. The branding on the product body highlights its purpose as a professional-grade insect exterminator suitable for home or workplace use. The structure appears durable, with a rectangular vented casing designed to maximize airflow and insect capture efficiency. The product is intended to offer reliable and chemical-free mosquito control.

SmartSlide Paper Shredder.product_description: A portable paper shredder ideal for securely destroying personal or office documents.
SmartSlide Paper Shredder.product_info: The SmartSlide Paper Shredder packaging shows a slim, compact shredder designed for small sheets and daily office use. The box highlights its USB-powered capability, making it convenient for laptop or desktop users. Its transparent waste bin design allows easy monitoring of shredded contents, and the product is positioned as a lightweight, portable solution for confidential paper disposal.

Pinless Stapler.product_description: A safe and eco-friendly pinless stapler suitable for students, offices, and craft projects.
Pinless Stapler.product_info: The Pinless Stapler shown in the image uses a mechanical folding method instead of metal pins, allowing users to bind papers without traditional staples. The product body includes a diagram demonstrating how the mechanism punches and interlocks paper layers to create a secure binding. It is marketed as safe for children, environmentally friendly, and practical for everyday paperwork and school use.

Portable Steam Press.product_description: A compact garment steamer built for quick wrinkle removal at home or during travel.
Portable Steam Press.product_info: The Portable Steam Press image shows a handheld unit with a streamlined body and detachable water reservoir. The packaging visual highlights features like rapid heating and strong steam output suitable for shirts, sarees, coats, and delicate fabrics. The ergonomic handle and lightweight frame make the device ideal for on-the-go ironing and quick touch-ups, especially for travelers and professionals.

Reclining Seat.product_description: A foldable reclining seat offering cushioned back support for indoor or outdoor use.
Reclining Seat.product_info: The Reclining Seat features a soft padded base and an adjustable backrest frame that can lock into multiple angles. The product image shows a durable fabric exterior with reinforced edging, indicating long-term use. This seat is designed for picnics, gaming, floor seating, sporting events, or meditation. Its foldable construction makes it highly portable and easy to store.

Smart Light Tip Pens.product_description: LED-illuminated writing pens suitable for note-taking in dark or low-light conditions.
Smart Light Tip Pens.product_info: The image displays multiple Smart Light Tip Pens packaged together, each equipped with a bright LED emitter at the tip. The pens feature a metallic clip-on design and a rubber grip for comfortable writing. The packaging highlights the usefulness of the illuminated tip for hospital workers, drivers, students, and night-shift users. The pen design is sleek and intended for functional as well as promotional use.

Super Blower.product_description: A compact blower fan designed for personal cooling and desktop use.
Super Blower.product_info: The Super Blower shown in the box features a compact motor housing with a front air outlet and a side speed selector switch offering two airflow levels. The packaging highlights its portable structure, energy-efficient operation, and suitability for small rooms, study desks, and travel. Its sturdy design and ergonomic handle promote ease of use and carrying convenience.

Super Wrench.product_description: A universal wrench tool designed to fit various nut and bolt sizes.
Super Wrench.product_info: The Super Wrench packaging showcases a two-piece wrench set capable of adjusting automatically to different bolt sizes. The images emphasize its multi-purpose use for plumbing, automotive repair, and household maintenance. The rubberized handles and steel jaws are highlighted as durable and grip-efficient, making it a versatile addition to any toolkit.

RadiSafe Mobile Radiation Protector.product_description: A shield designed to reduce exposure to harmful mobile phone radiation and heat.
RadiSafe Mobile Radiation Protector.product_info: The RadiSafe mobile radiation protector is presented as a scientifically proven solution to reduce EMR radiation emitted by smartphones. The product packaging highlights that it can be used on any mobile phone and significantly reduces both radiation and heating effects. Visuals in the image show thermal comparison scans illustrating heat reduction when the RadiSafe chip is applied. It is branded professionally and advertised as tested and verified with supporting certifications, making it suitable for users seeking additional protection against mobile radiation.

UV Sterilization Pen.product_title: Portable UV Water Purifier Sterilization Pen
UV Sterilization Pen.product_description: A handheld ultraviolet purification pen that disinfects and purifies drinking water anywhere.
UV Sterilization Pen.product_info: The UV Sterilization Pen uses ultraviolet light technology to clean water by destroying bacteria, viruses, and protozoan cysts such as giardia and cryptosporidia. The promotional visuals explain that this technology is the same used in municipal water purification systems across the world. The product claims to purify up to 50 liters with alkaline batteries, or up to 150 liters with lithium batteries. The long lamp life of approximately 8,000 cycles makes it a durable and reliable choice for travelers, hikers, and emergency situations. The images show practical use cases including dipping the pen into a glass of water and storing it in a protective sleeve.

BedBoost Mattress Support.product_description: An inflatable mattress support that restores sagging beds and improves sleep comfort.
BedBoost Mattress Support.product_info: BedBoost is shown as an inflatable support system designed to instantly lift and stabilize sagging mattresses. Images depict before-and-after scenarios demonstrating improved back alignment and enhanced comfort. The product is positioned as useful for preventing back pain by adjusting mattress curvature and can also be placed under the legs for elevation. The promotional text highlights quick setup, universal mattress compatibility, and its benefits for restful sleep. It appears as a practical solution for extending mattress life and improving sleep posture.

Moisture Pen Skin Analyzer.product_description: A handheld skin moisture analyzer designed to check hydration and smoothness.
Moisture Pen Skin Analyzer.product_info: The Moisture Pen shown in the image is a compact skincare diagnostic tool used to measure moisture levels and smoothness through skin conduction technology. The product includes an LED display, on/off controls, and a touch sensor head for reading hydration values. Promotional text indicates that it is widely used by individuals for personal skincare evaluation. The imagery demonstrates its application on the face and outlines basic features such as restart button, measurement display, and protective cap.

Cap Humidifier.product_description: A compact USB-powered humidifier that fits onto bottles to add moisture to indoor air.
Cap Humidifier.product_info: The Cap Humidifier features a simple cap-shaped design that converts regular bottles into functional humidifiers. According to the product sheet, it provides relief from dry air and helps reduce particulate matter. The compact size allows it to fit easily into bags, making it ideal for office desks, bedrooms, and travel. The included components—USB cable, absorbent cotton stick, and humidifier cap—highlight ease of use and portability. Visuals show multiple color options and demonstrate the mist output in various environments.

Smart Key Finder.product_title: PROTEKT Bluetooth Smart Key Finder & Anti-Lost Alarm
Smart Key Finder.product_description: A Bluetooth-enabled anti-loss tracker designed to help locate keys, pets, bags, and personal items.
Smart Key Finder.product_info: The Smart Key Finder uses Bluetooth connectivity to track lost items through a mobile app featuring radar-like detection. The image shows multiple color options, highlighting compatibility with smartphones for remote tracking and alert functions. The device can attach to keychains, pet collars, or bags, with additional features like selfie shutter control and anti-loss notifications. The compact size and simple single-button design make it practical for everyday use.

Multi Key Finder Set.product_title: Wireless RF Multi Key Finder with Remote and LED Flashlight
Multi Key Finder Set.product_description: A multi-tag wireless key finder system that locates lost items using a color-coded remote control.
Multi Key Finder Set.product_info: The Multi Key Finder set includes a central remote base with four color-coded receivers. Pressing a button on the remote triggers beeping and flashing lights on the corresponding tag, aiding quick location of lost keys, wallets, or household items. The images illustrate LED flashlights built into the remote and tags, making it especially useful in dark environments. The system offers a transmitting range of 30–40 meters and provides a simple, user-friendly method for managing multiple items.

Bluetooth Audio Receiver.product_title: Wireless Bluetooth Audio Receiver for Speakers
Bluetooth Audio Receiver.product_description: A USB-powered Bluetooth receiver that converts wired speakers into wireless audio systems.
Bluetooth Audio Receiver.product_info: The Bluetooth Audio Receiver allows any traditional speaker system with a 3.5mm jack to play audio wirelessly from Bluetooth-enabled devices. Promotional text in the image emphasizes easy plug-and-play installation and universal compatibility with phones, tablets, laptops, and gaming devices. The compact USB form factor and included audio cable make it a versatile accessory for upgrading older speakers and home sound systems.

SmartSlide Hoverboard.product_title: SmartSlide Electric Hoverboard with Bluetooth Speakers
SmartSlide Hoverboard.product_description: A self-balancing electric hoverboard designed for personal transport and recreation.
SmartSlide Hoverboard.product_info: The SmartSlide Hoverboard features dual footpads, an electric self-balancing system, and built-in Bluetooth speakers for music playback while riding. The promotional graphics state that it can travel up to 15 km on a single charge and requires no license or registration. High-quality battery configuration and a carry bag are included as shown in the images. Additional visuals demonstrate leaning controls for forward and backward movement and examples of outdoor usage.

SmartWatch.product_description: A multi-function Bluetooth smartwatch with touch display and fitness utilities.
SmartWatch.product_info: The SmartWatch shown includes a 1.48-inch capacitive touchscreen with Bluetooth 3.0+EDR connectivity. Its feature list includes calling, music playback, remote camera control, calculator, alarm clock, message reminders, pedometer, barometer, thermometer, altimeter, and anti-slide reminder. The image highlights multiple color options and a sleek wrist-worn design. Accessory list includes a USB cable and user guide, reinforcing ease of setup and everyday usability.

Gadget Cleaner Spray.product_title: SmartSlide Gadget Cleaner With Built-In Spray
Gadget Cleaner Spray.product_description: A portable cleaning tool with integrated spray for maintaining gadget screens.
Gadget Cleaner Spray.product_info: The Gadget Cleaner features a slim rectangular design with a built-in spray mechanism. The product packaging highlights its suitability for cleaning smartphone screens, tablets, laptops, and other electronic devices. Display stands in the image showcase multiple color variants and retail-ready presentation. The product is marketed as simple and effective, offering an all-in-one cleaning solution for everyday digital devices.

SmartSlide Bluetooth SmartWatch.product_description: A multifunction Bluetooth smartwatch with touchscreen display and daily-use smart features.
SmartSlide Bluetooth SmartWatch.product_info: The SmartSlide Bluetooth SmartWatch features a 1.48-inch capacitive touchscreen TFT LCD designed for on-wrist convenience. The specifications shown in the image highlight Bluetooth V3.0+EDR connectivity and support for A2DP, HFP, and HS protocols. This smartwatch offers essential functionalities such as answering and dialing calls, alarm clock, music playback, calculator, message reminders, push notifications, call alerts, remote camera operation, pedometer, thermometer, barometer, altimeter, and anti-slide reminder. It supports multiple international languages including English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Russian, Arabic, Turkish, Korean, and more. With a 230mAh lithium battery, the watch provides up to 3 hours talk time, 6 hours music play time, and around 160 hours standby time. The package includes the smartwatch, a USB cable, and a user guide, making it a complete and ready-to-use smart wearable.

Moisture Pen Skin Analyzer.product_description: A simple and effective moisture analyzing pen that measures skin hydration levels instantly.
Moisture Pen Skin Analyzer.product_info: The Moisture Pen is a compact digital device used to monitor skin smoothness and hydration levels through skin conduction measurement. The product visuals highlight a sleek pen-style design with an LED display screen, on/off button, restart button, and a skin-touch sensor head. It is shown being used on facial skin to evaluate moisture content, making it ideal for skincare routines and hydration tracking. The image text emphasizes that the device is simple, easy to use, and widely adopted by individuals worldwide for personal skincare evaluation. The protective cap ensures hygiene, while the straightforward button layout allows quick measurements anytime. Its ergonomic and portable build makes it suitable for daily skincare assessment.

Electric Powered Stapler.product_description: An automatic electric stapler designed for hassle-free paper stapling without manual effort.
Electric Powered Stapler.product_info: This Electric Powered Stapler features a transparent retro-style body showcasing its internal mechanism. The product sheet indicates that it can staple up to 14 sheets of 20lb paper using No. 26/6 staples, or 12 sheets using No. 24/6 staples. Simply inserting papers into the front slot triggers instant automatic stapling without pressing any button. It runs on four AA batteries or an AC/DC adaptor, making it suitable for office, school, and home use. The unit is available in multiple attractive colors and has a compact size of 155 × 90 × 101 mm.

Digital Video Memo Recorder.product_title: Digital Video Memo Recorder for Fridges and Workspaces
Digital Video Memo Recorder.product_description: A compact device for recording and playing short video reminders with a single touch.
Digital Video Memo Recorder.product_info: The Digital Video Memo Recorder enables users to leave 30-second live video messages for family and colleagues. The product visuals show a magnetic back for easy placement on refrigerators or metal surfaces. Features include multilingual audio/video recording, simple one-button operation for recording and playback, and a compact display screen for viewing recorded messages. The device is promoted as a modern replacement for sticky notes, allowing schedules, reminders, and personal messages to be shared conveniently.

Diary With Built-in Calculator.product_description: A stylish diary that features a functional calculator integrated into the front cover.
Diary With Built-in Calculator.product_info: This unique diary includes a fully functional printed calculator embedded in the front cover, allowing quick calculations while writing notes. The product images show multiple color variations with spiral binding for easy page turning. The calculator includes standard number keys, memory functions, and basic operations. The combination of notebook and calculator makes it ideal for students, office professionals, and executives who want convenience and practicality in one compact design.

Friction Pen Magic Erase Pen.product_title: Magic Erase Thermal Sensitive Ink Pen
Friction Pen Magic Erase Pen.product_description: A thermal-sensitive pen that allows ink to be erased using heat or the built-in eraser.
Friction Pen Magic Erase Pen.product_info: The Friction Pen uses special thermo-sensitive ink that disappears when heat is applied. According to the product sheet, users can erase writing by rubbing with the built-in friction eraser or by gently heating the paper. The pen has a tip size of 0.7 mm and a click mechanism. The visuals show different color options, making it suitable for students, teachers, and professionals who require neat, erasable writing for notes, diagrams, or corrections.

Magic Wireless NFC Speaker.product_title: Magic NFC Wireless Speaker with Induction Play
Magic Wireless NFC Speaker.product_description: A wireless induction speaker that plays music from your phone without Bluetooth pairing.
Magic Wireless NFC Speaker.product_info: The Magic Wireless Speaker uses NFC-style induction technology to amplify audio without Bluetooth or cables. Users simply place their smartphone on the speaker surface to begin playback. The device features a rechargeable long-duration battery and is shown in multiple color options. The simple design and effortless operation make it ideal for quick music sharing at home or outdoors without needing wireless pairing or setup.

Multi-Utility Tool Kit.product_description: A compact 24-piece tool kit shaped like a car tyre, suitable for home and vehicle use.
Multi-Utility Tool Kit.product_info: This multi-utility tool kit contains 24 precision tools including pliers, screwdrivers, sockets, a measuring tape, a bit set, and a knife. Packaged in a compact tyre-shaped case, it offers easy storage and portability. The product visuals highlight neatly arranged tool slots and a durable outer casing. It is designed for basic repairs, DIY work, and emergency auto maintenance, making it a practical tool set for homes and vehicles.

Universal 8x Zoom Mobile Lens.product_title: Universal 8x Zoom Telescope Lens for Smartphones
Universal 8x Zoom Mobile Lens.product_description: A clip-on telescope lens that provides 8x zoom capability for smartphone cameras.
Universal 8x Zoom Mobile Lens.product_info: The Universal 8x Zoom Lens attaches to smartphones using an adjustable clip mount. The product sheet emphasizes compatibility with iPhone, Samsung, Sony Xperia, HTC, and other smartphone models. The lens improves distant photography by providing clear 8x magnification. The package includes the telescope lens, mounting clip, and a storage box. Images show usage demonstrations and close-up shots of the lens construction.

Natural Breeze Clip Fan.product_description: A clip-on fan designed to deliver natural-feel airflow with flexible positioning.
Natural Breeze Clip Fan.product_info: The Natural Breeze Clip Fan features a unique soft-blade design that produces a gentle, natural-feeling breeze. It can be clipped onto desks, bed frames, strollers, or any suitable surface. The product visuals highlight various blade styles and color options. The fan operates safely without hard plastic blades, making it suitable for children’s rooms and personal spaces. With adjustable height and rotation positions, it offers versatile cooling for home or office environments.

Travel Kit.product_title: High Quality Travel Kit with Essential Accessories
Travel Kit.product_description: A complete travel kit containing essential comfort and hygiene accessories for journeys.
Travel Kit.product_info: The Travel Kit shown includes essential travel accessories such as socks, eye mask, ear plugs, a smart carry pouch, a resettable combination lock, and a neck pillow. The visuals highlight soft materials and multiple color options for comfort. Designed for frequent travelers, the kit provides convenience and preparedness for long journeys, flights, or road trips by keeping all essentials organized in one compact package.

Bluetooth Stereo Headphones.product_title: Bluetooth Stereo Headphones with FM & MP3 Player
Bluetooth Stereo Headphones.product_description: Foldable wireless stereo headphones featuring Bluetooth playback, FM radio, and MP3 support.
Bluetooth Stereo Headphones.product_info: These Bluetooth Stereo Headphones offer wireless music playback from any Bluetooth-enabled device, along with support for FM radio and MP3 playback via an SD or TF card. The foldable design makes them compact and travel-friendly. The visuals display cushioned ear pads and an adjustable headband for comfortable long-term use. Control buttons on the earcup allow easy switching between modes and managing playback. Designed for high-quality audio and everyday convenience, the headphones come in attractive color combinations and retail-ready packaging.

Super Mini Bluetooth Earbud.product_description: A compact wireless Bluetooth earbud designed for calls and music playback on the go.
Super Mini Bluetooth Earbud.product_info: The Super Mini Bluetooth Earbud features a single-button lightweight design with a prominent Bluetooth logo on the face. It is compatible with phones, laptops, MP3 players, and other Bluetooth audio devices. The visuals highlight ergonomic comfort for extended wear and hands-free calling. The earbud supports taking calls, playing music, and simple pairing. Its extremely compact size and glossy finish make it ideal for drivers, commuters, and daily communication needs.

Mini Wireless Keyboard.product_title: Mini Wireless Keyboard with Built-In Touchpad
Mini Wireless Keyboard.product_description: A compact wireless keyboard featuring a full QWERTY layout and integrated touchpad.
Mini Wireless Keyboard.product_info: The Mini Wireless Keyboard (model NS903) includes a full QWERTY keyboard layout with dedicated media keys, a built-in touchpad, and scroll buttons. Its ergonomic grip allows single-handed or two-handed operation. The product packaging shows support for smart TVs, computers, and media devices. The lightweight build, wireless connectivity, and responsive touchpad make it ideal for presentations, entertainment systems, and remote control use.

Shoe Shine Kit.product_title: Premium Shoe Shine Kit in Wooden & Travel Cases
Shoe Shine Kit.product_description: A premium shoe care kit featuring multiple brushes, polish, and accessories for footwear maintenance.
Shoe Shine Kit.product_info: The Shoe Shine Kit includes a high-quality wooden collector’s box containing brushes, polish tins, cloths, and a shoe horn. Additional compact travel-friendly cases are also shown, offering portable versions of the kit. The visuals highlight organized compartments and durable craftsmanship suitable for professional shoe care. Ideal for travelers, executives, and grooming-conscious individuals, the kit delivers complete footwear maintenance in elegant packaging.

Mini Coffee Maker.product_title: Super Cool Mini Coffee Maker with Porcelain Cup
Mini Coffee Maker.product_description: A compact electric coffee maker with included porcelain cup and removable filter basket.
Mini Coffee Maker.product_info: The Mini Coffee Maker has a 150ml capacity and includes a porcelain cup for brewing. The product images show a removable filter basket, on/off lighted switch, permanent filter, and washable filter holder. It operates on 230V / 50Hz with a 450W power rating. The compact design and fast brewing functionality make it ideal for office desks, small kitchens, and travel use. The unit dimensions are listed as 112 × 135 × 197 mm with GS/CE/EMC/ROHS approval.

Mosquito Repellent Bands.product_description: Citronella-based repellent bands and patches designed to provide long-lasting mosquito protection.
Mosquito Repellent Bands.product_info: These Mosquito Repellent Bands and patches use 100% vegetable-based citronella oil to provide protection without DEET chemicals. The refillable pellets offer up to 15 days of continuous protection. The product visuals show multiple outdoor usage scenarios, including family activities, sports, camping, and travel. Safe for children, the patches can be applied to clothing, bags, or nearby surfaces, offering convenient and natural mosquito defense.

LED Work Light Powerbank.product_title: LED Work Light with Built-In 4000/5000mAh Powerbank
LED Work Light Powerbank.product_description: A high-brightness LED work light that doubles as a portable power bank.
LED Work Light Powerbank.product_info: The LED Work Light includes a tall vertical light bar featuring multiple LEDs, suitable for desks, metallic surfaces, bicycles, and reading environments. It comes with a charging stand and can operate as a standalone lamp or magnetic work light. The built-in 4000/5000mAh powerbank allows users to charge mobile devices, making it a multifunctional utility tool for workspaces, outdoor use, and emergency lighting.

Programmable USB Message Fan.product_title: Programmable USB Message Fan with Custom LED Text
Programmable USB Message Fan.product_description: A USB-powered fan that displays programmable LED messages while cooling.
Programmable USB Message Fan.product_info: The Programmable USB Message Fan allows users to create personalized LED messages in multiple languages that appear while the fan spins. The product includes a USB connector, flexible metal neck for adjustable positioning, an on/off switch, and a software CD for customizing the display text. It plugs directly into laptops, power banks, or USB adapters. The visuals show bright blue LED patterns forming letters and symbols, making it ideal for desk use, gifting, and fun promotional displays.

Bluetooth Photo Snapper.product_title: Bluetooth Remote Shutter for Mobile Photography
Bluetooth Photo Snapper.product_description: A compact wireless shutter button for capturing photos and videos from a distance.
Bluetooth Photo Snapper.product_info: The Bluetooth Photo Snapper enables remote clicking of photos and videos from up to 35 feet away. The visuals show compatibility with both Android and iOS devices without the need for software installation. The compact remote includes dedicated buttons for each operating system and features a built-in lithium battery for long-distance use. With its lightweight design and keychain-friendly shape, it is ideal for selfies, group photos, and tripod photography.

Super Audio Bluetooth Headset.product_description: A rugged and portable Bluetooth headset designed for music and hands-free calls.
Super Audio Bluetooth Headset.product_info: The Super Audio Bluetooth Headset features a sporty neckband-style ring with circular ear modules for comfortable wear during movement. The images highlight multiple color options and built-in control buttons for music and call management. It connects to phones, laptops, MP3 players, and other Bluetooth audio sources. The rugged design makes it suitable for travel, workouts, and outdoor use, offering reliable audio performance with a wear-anywhere experience.

USB Mini Aroma Kit.product_description: A compact aroma diffuser that plugs into any USB port to release pleasant fragrance.
USB Mini Aroma Kit.product_info: The USB Mini Aroma Kit includes a slim USB stick-style diffuser available in colorful pastel designs. It connects to any USB port on laptops, computers, chargers, or power banks. The pack includes replaceable aroma pads and a refill dropper. The visuals emphasize its compactness and portability, allowing users to enjoy their favorite aroma in offices, homes, or cars. The floral-themed packaging reinforces its soothing and refreshing purpose.

Portable Video Memo Recorder.product_title: Digital Video Memo Recorder for Fridges and Workspaces
Portable Video Memo Recorder.product_description: A compact video-note device that records and plays back short reminders.
Portable Video Memo Recorder.product_info: The Digital Video Memo Recorder allows users to capture 30-second video reminders with a single button. The product attaches magnetically to refrigerators or metallic surfaces. The visuals display a clear color screen, front camera, and built-in speaker for playback. Promoted as a modern replacement for sticky notes, it helps families and professionals leave multilingual video messages easily and conveniently.

UV Mobile Sanitizer.product_description: A UV-based mobile sanitizer designed to eliminate germs from phones and small items.
UV Mobile Sanitizer.product_info: The UV Mobile Sanitizer features a cylindrical chamber that emits disinfecting UV light to sanitize mobile phones and accessories. The visuals show multiple color options and a simple drop-in design. The device includes a removable tray and battery compartment. The UV Cell Phone Sanitizer packaging emphasizes sterilization benefits for hygiene-conscious users, offering convenience for homes, offices, and medical environments.

Mosquito Repellent Bands Variant.product_description: A natural citronella oil-based mosquito repellent band set with long-lasting pellets.
Mosquito Repellent Bands Variant.product_info: This variant of Mosquito Repellent Bands features bright yellow refillable pellets and playful packaging targeted toward children and families. The bands use pure citronella oil and are DEET-free, making them safe for kids. The refill capsules last up to 15 days. The visuals show usage during family activities, sports, travel, and outdoor adventures. The fun design and easy application make it an appealing mosquito protection option.

Oral Hygiene Dental Kit.product_description: A multi-tool dental kit containing toothbrush, floss, mirror, and gum-care accessories.
Oral Hygiene Dental Kit.product_info: The Oral Hygiene Dental Kit includes a full-head toothbrush with rounded bristles, a combined floss and toothpick tool, an interdental brush, a plaque stain eraser, dental floss, and a dental mirror. The product visuals highlight its capability to clean hard-to-reach mouth areas and remove plaque efficiently. The kit promotes improved oral hygiene, stain removal, and better gum health. Suitable for home users, travelers, and daily dental care needs.

Nail Clipper with Magnifier.product_description: A grooming nail clipper equipped with a magnifying lens for precision cutting.
Nail Clipper with Magnifier.product_info: This Nail Clipper integrates a circular magnifying lens to enhance visibility while trimming nails. The visuals show sturdy metal jaws and ergonomic grip for safer trimming, especially useful for seniors or individuals with reduced eyesight. The magnifier helps ensure accurate cutting and reduces the risk of injury. Packaged as a grooming-essential gadget, it is practical for home use and travel.

Portable Gas Stove.product_description: A portable gas stove designed for cooking, heating, or picnics.
Portable Gas Stove.product_info: The Portable Gas Stove features a compact design with a built-in ignition system, allowing users to cook or heat food anywhere. The visuals show sturdy metal burners enclosed in red and yellow casings. It is marketed as a simple-to-operate device that can be carried in a car or handbag, making it ideal for camping, picnics, and emergency use.

Portable Gas Burner.product_description: A high-heat portable gas burner suitable for outdoor, hobby, and utility use.
Portable Gas Burner.product_info: The Portable Gas Burner includes a metal nozzle torch compatible with gas canisters shown in the visuals.
